import React from "react"; import styled from "styled-components"; export default function DonationForm() { return ( {/* Form 1 Container For Swapping */} Blood Donation Form It is said that blood is one of the most priceless gifts one can give to another. Blood is essential for a person to stay alive. Many times due to accidents or any other serious ailments, a person might require blood. And in those times, people who step up to donate their blood are real-life superheroes

What is Your Blood Type ?

 {/* question container 3 */}

Have you done a blood donation before?

 {/* question container 4 */}

Have you had any disease?

 {/* question container 5 */}

Do you have any allergies?

 {/* Terms and Conditions */}
{/* Money Donation Form container */} Blood Donation Form It is said that blood is one of the most priceless gifts one can give to another. Blood is essential for a person to stay alive. Many times due to accidents or any other serious ailments, a person might require blood. And in those times, people who step up to donate their blood are real-life superheroes

What is Your Blood Type ?

 {/* question container 3 */}

Have you done a blood donation before?

 {/* question container 4 */}

Have you had any disease?

 {/* question container 5 */}

Do you have any allergies?

 {/* Terms and Conditions */}
); } // MainContainer For Dontains form const MainContainer = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; border: 2px solid pink; `; // left arrow container const LeftArrowContainer = styled.div` width: 5%; img { width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 50%; transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out; &:hover { cursor: pointer; transform: scale(1.08); } } `; // All forms container css const MainScrollDiv = styled.div` width: 90%; height: 100%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; margin-top: 2%; `; const ScrollForms = styled.div` width: 100%; height: auto; display: flex; justify-content: left; align-items: center; overflow: auto; position: relative; scroll-behavior: smooth; `; const AllformsContainer = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; border: 2px solid aqua; position: relative; overflow: auto; width: 100%; overflow: hidden; `; // BloodDonation Form Container const DonationOfBloodForm = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; position: relative; width: 180%; overflow: auto; border: 2px solid purple; `; const BloodDonationContainer = styled.div` box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 2px 4px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 8px 16px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); color: #090b13; /* width: 90%; */ width: 100%; border-radius: 4px; `; const ImgAndHeadingAndParagraphContainer = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: row; padding: 4px; margin: 3px; `; const HeadingAndDetailsContainer = styled.div` box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%; padding: 3px; margin: 1px; `; const MainHeadingContainer = styled.p` text-align: center; font-family: "Bree Serif", serif; font-size: 2rem; color: white; font-weight: bold; display: inline-flex; padding: 10px; color: #090b13; border-radius: 5px; word-spacing: 0.5rem; line-height: 1.4rem; `; const MainDetailsContainer = styled.p` text-align: center; color: #090b13; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; word-spacing: 0.5rem; line-height: 1.4rem; box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: 15px; `; const ImgContainer = styled.div` width: 18%; padding: 3px; margin: 1px; img { width: 100%; height: 100%; } `; // Form Details Container const FormDetailsContainer = styled.div` margin-top: 3%; `; // Name container css const NameContainer = styled.div` display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: flex-start; `; const InnerNameContainer = styled.div` margin: 4px; padding: 3px; width: 100%; input { font-size: 1.2rem; text-align: left; width: 100%; border-radius: 4px; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; color: #090b13; border: 2px solid #525e8d; padding: 3px; cursor: pointer; } input:focus { outline: none; border: 2px solid #090b13; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 2px 4px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 8px 16px; } `; // Phone number container code css const PhoneNumberContainer = styled.div` display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: flex-start; width: 100%; `; const CountryCodeContainer = styled.div` margin: 4px; padding: 3px; width: 20%; input { font-size: 1.2rem; text-align: left; width: 100%; border-radius: 4px; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; color: #090b13; border: 2px solid #525e8d; padding: 3px; cursor: pointer; } input:focus { outline: none; border: 2px solid #090b13; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 2px 4px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 8px 16px; } `; const PhoneContainer = styled.div` margin: 4px; padding: 3px; width: 100%; input { font-size: 1.2rem; text-align: left; width: 100%; border-radius: 4px; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; color: #090b13; border: 2px solid #525e8d; padding: 3px; cursor: pointer; } input:focus { outline: none; border: 2px solid #090b13; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 2px 4px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 8px 16px; } `; // css for blood group container const QuestionLabel = styled.label` display: flex; justify-content: flex-start; align-items: center; margin: 3px; p { color: #090b13; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; word-spacing: 0.2rem; line-height: 1.4rem; font-weight: bold; box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 1.3rem; padding: 4px; } `; const BloodGroupContainer = styled.div` display: flex; align-items: flex-start; justify-content: center; width: 100%; `; const PositiveBloodContainer = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: flex-start; width: 100%; `; const NegativeBloodContainer = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center; width: 100%; `; const InnerContainer = styled.div` display: flex; width: 92%; label { text-align: left; padding: 4px; margin: 3px; text-align: center; color: #090b13; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; word-spacing: 0.2rem; line-height: 1.4rem; box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 1.1rem; } input { padding: 2px; margin: 3px; text-align: center; color: #090b13; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; word-spacing: 0.2rem; line-height: 1.4rem; box-sizing: border-box; cursor: pointer; } `; // css for choice container const ChoiceConatainer = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; width: 100%; `; const ChoiceInnerConatainer = styled.div` width: 95%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: flex-start; label { text-align: left; padding: 4px; margin: 3px; text-align: center; color: #090b13; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; word-spacing: 0.2rem; line-height: 1.4rem; box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 1.1rem; } input { padding: 2px; margin: 3px; text-align: center; color: #090b13; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; word-spacing: 0.2rem; line-height: 1.4rem; box-sizing: border-box; cursor: pointer; } `; // Terms and condition container const TermsAndConditionConatainer = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; width: 100%; margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 2%; `; const TermsAndConditionInnerConatainer = styled.div` width: 99%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: flex-start; label { text-align: left; padding: 4px; margin: 3px; text-align: center; color: #090b13; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; word-spacing: 0.2rem; line-height: 1.4rem; box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 1.2rem; } input { padding: 2px; margin: 3px; text-align: center; color: #090b13; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; word-spacing: 0.2rem; line-height: 1.4rem; box-sizing: border-box; cursor: pointer; } `; // MoneyDonation Form Container const DonationOfMoneyForm = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; width: 100%; border: 2px solid grey; `; // Right Arrow Container const RightArrowContainer = styled.div` width: 5%; img { width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 50%; transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out; &:hover { cursor: pointer; transform: scale(1.08); } } `;
